thread.title: Great stay for business
thread.title_full: Great stay for business - Review of Pullman London St Pancras Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Joel R
title: Great stay for business
text: Very nice hotel close to subways and Regent Park. Alin was very friendly and helpful at check-in; as I arrived early in the morning and my room was not ready, he gave great suggestions where to have breakfast and he arranged a larger room for me when I returned. My room was comfortable, large, and quiet; very good for sleeping. The hotel has a wonderful breakfast and the meeting rooms were quiet, well-lit and well stocked. Also a well-stocked lobby bar. I would stay here again for sure.
